exception.name: ErrorLoggingOfEventNotConfigurable
exception.description: This exception is thrown by the SE API method configureLogging when specified event is not configurable.

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorLoggingOfEventNotConfigurable that is thrown by the SE API method configureLogging when specified event is not configurable.

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when attempting to configure an event that is not configurable
